T02TD2859E:197b-1: lo ki shva ra sim ha n'a da sto tra n'a ma /
T02TD2859E:198a-0: @198a * // 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
T02TD2859E:198a-1: 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2859E:198a-2: gang gis 'jig rten nyes pa ma lus dbang gyur ji srid legs pa'i lam la ma bkod pa //
T02TD2859E:198a-3: de srid de dag yang dag gdon phyir bdag ni byang chub mchog tu bgrod bar byed ma gyur //
T02TD2859E:198a-4: gang gis khams gsum 'di dag seng ge'i sgra chen mchog gis gsal bar gang gyur pas //
T02TD2859E:198a-5: sdug bsngal can dag bskyab phyir thugs rje'i spyan dang seng ge sgra ldan khyod la bstod //
T02TD2859E:198a-6: ral pa rgya che'i dbyibs can dri med zla 'dra shin tu dkar ba'i zhal mnga' ba //
T02TD2859E:198a-7: bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags brtul zhugs chen po shin tu dag byed dang ldan pa //
T02TD2859E:198a-8: 'gro ba ma lus phan mdzad lha dang lha min grub pa rnams kyis rab btud pa //
T02TD2859E:198a-9: shin tu rgya che ba yi sku mnga' khyod la rtag tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2859E:198a-10: padma dmar po rgyas pa zla ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i gdan //
T02TD2859E:198a-11: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng na rgyal po'i rol pas rnam par mdzes //
T02TD2859E:198a-12: chos kyi mnga' bdag 'byor pas dri med gsung ni bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2859E:198a-13: 'jig rten mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i dpal gyis dbul mtshan la 'dud //
T02TD2859E:198a-14: g-yas kyi phyag ni padma gsal ba lta bur 'jam pa yis //
T02TD2859E:198a-15: khams gsum nyes pa gsum po zhi bar bya phyir rtse gsum pa //
T02TD2859E:198a-16: 'od zer 'bar 'khrigs sprul dang ldan pas rtag tu gang 'dzin pa //
T02TD2859E:198a-17: bdag gi thub pa seng ge sgra de la ni rtag tu phyag bgyi'o //
T02TD2859E:198a-18: khams gsum po la thugs rje chen pos gnas kyang skyon gyis ni //
T02TD2859E:198a-19: khyod la gos pa med kyang de dag spang phyir khyed kyis ni// g-yon pa'i phyag gis ral gri dam rdzas dang bcas padma bsnams //
T02TD2859E:198a-20: rgyal ba'i sras po khyod la rtag tu bdag nyid skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2859E:198a-21: nga rgyal la sogs tshogs kyis g-yengs pa'i sems can rnams la ni //
T02TD2859E:198a-22: dmigs nas rgyal ba lnga po yang dag spros nas de rnams la //
T02TD2859E:198a-23: ji lta ji ltar dag pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dag gis mdzad pa rnams //
T02TD2859E:198a-24: gang la dgongs pa de mnga' phyag na padma de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2859E:198a-25: mkhas pa rnams kyis gang la tshig gi go skabs med pa ni //
T02TD2859E:198a-26: thos pa la sogs bral bas khyod la mos dang gus pa med //
T02TD2859E:198b-0: de @198b dag rnams kyis mkhas pa'i mchog nyang dag ni thob pa yi //
T02TD2859E:198b-1: mnyam med dpal ldan seng ge sgra la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2859E:198b-2: skye ba gzhan gyi mi dge mdze yi rnam par gyur pa rus pa dang //
T02TD2859E:198b-3: sna nas rkang lag srin bus skad 'gags ldan pa dag / khyod bstod pas ni skad cig gis ni gser mdog lta bu'i lus su gyur //
T02TD2859E:198b-4: thub pa seng ge sgra khyod la ni de nyid de la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2859E:198b-5: klu yi mnga' bdag gyur pa chu lha dbang du mdzad nas ni //
T02TD2859E:198b-6: dus min char dang char med mdze dang skyon dag zhi don dang //
T02TD2859E:198b-7: 'gro ba'i don dang don med tshogs dag rab tu sel bar mdzad pa yi //
T02TD2859E:198b-8: brtson 'grus brtan par rab brtsams khyod la kun nas 'dud //
T02TD2859E:198b-9: mang du brjod pas ci zhig khyod kyi mtshan dang sku gnag dang //
T02TD2859E:198b-10: gang zhig la la gus pas 'dzin pa dang ni sems dga' dag / skye bo de ni longs spyod rgya che bdag thob par gyur nas kyang //
T02TD2859E:198b-11: srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal dkar brgal nas mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2859E:198b-12: ngag gi dbang phyug la sogs gang gis kyang ni rje btsun gyi //
T02TD2859E:198b-13: yon tan phyogs gcig cha tsam bskal pa du ma ru //
T02TD2859E:198b-14: 'bad pas kyang ni brjod par nus pa ma yin na //
T02TD2859E:198b-15: ji ltar bdag 'dras 'khrul kyang gus byas 'di dag bzod par gsol //
T02TD2859E:198b-16: 'jig rten gsum po'i sdug bsngal 'phrog byed mchog gi dges byed can //
T02TD2859E:198b-17: dpal ldan seng ge sgra yi bstod pa las thob bsod nams gang //
T02TD2859E:198b-18: dpag med kunda do shal dgod pa dkar po dang 'dra ba //
T02TD2859E:198b-19: de yis skye bo byang chub 'gyur med go 'phang myur thob shog / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i bstod pa /
T02TD2859E:198b-20: rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po ti la kas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2859E:198b-22: // / pandi ta de nyid dang lo ts'a ba mal gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
